attributes.action: denounce publicly the unfairness; inappropriateness and gross immorality in the government policy of taking income tax from pensioners, who have worked for 20, 30, 40 or more years, to pay for gold plated obscene pensions and tax free allowances, as well as other services for resigned or voted out of office politicians who have served only short terms in ministerial appointments and at the same time cancel the scheme and cancel the tax free status of anybody receiving such pensions and allowances immediately on making the announcement
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After only 10 years in post a party political prime minister (who may have been appointed by his party and NOT VOTED INTO OFFICE) can accrue an annual pension of GBP117,500.00p and become entitled to a tax free "public service allowance" of GBP90,000.00 a year (for life!) as well as becoming entitled to free telephone calls; free stationery etc etc.  Some people work hard for up to 50 years and retire with virtually NOTHING by comparison and are still required to pay income tax and have no entitlement to free telephones, chauffeur driven cars, etc, so these arrangements CANNOT BE RIGHT!
